00023  enum Info_VarEvent {
00024 #define VAR_EVENT(x,y) VAR_INFO_##x ,
00025 #include "PropEvents.h"
00026 #undef VAR_EVENT
00027   VarEvent_END
00028   };
00029

00032  { VAR_INFO_BOOL , VAR_INFO_BOUNDVAR, VAR_INFO_SPARSEBOUND, VAR_INFO_RANGEVAR ,
00033  VAR_INFO_BIGRANGEVAR, VarType_END
00034  };

00036 enum Info_ConEvent {
00037 CON_INFO_StaticTrigger,
00038 CON_INFO_DynamicTrigger,
00039 CON_INFO_SpecialTrigger,
00040 CON_INFO_DynamicMovePtr,
00041 CON_INFO_AddSpecialToQueue,
00042 CON_INFO_AddConToQueue,
00043 CON_INFO_AddDynToQueue,
00044 CON_INFO_SearchTrie,
00045 CON_INFO_LoopSearchTrie,
00046 ConEvent_END
00047 };
00048  
00049 enum Info_PropEvent {
00050 #define PROP_EVENT(x) PROP_INFO_##x ,
00051 #include "PropEvents.h"
00052 #undef PROP_EVENT
00053 PropEvent_END
00054  };
00055

00057 const int VarTypeCount=VarType_END;
00058 const int ConEventCount=ConEvent_END;
00059 const int PropEventCount=PropEvent_END;

00064 VarInfoAddone(VarType, VAR_INFO_ ## VarEvent)
00065 
00066 #define CON_INFO_ADDONE(ConEvent) \
00067 ConInfoAddone(CON_INFO_ ## ConEvent)
00068 
00069 #define PROP_INFO_ADDONE(PropEvent) \
00070 PropInfoAddone(PROP_INFO_ ## PropEvent)
